alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:40PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from decaying showers will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota and Bennett Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1038 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong wind gusts from a line of decaying showers extending from 2 miles west of LaCreek North Housing to near Wolf Creek Housing. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Martin, Allen, Batesland, Tuthill, Hisle, Harrington, Wakpamni, Swett, LaCreek North Housing, Sunrise Housing, Vetal, Wolf Creek Housing, Yellow Bear Canyon, Lacreek Wildlife Refuge and southern Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
